sn35.159:4.1: “Rūpe, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, rūpāniccatañca yathābhūtaṃ samanupassatha.
sn35.159:4.2: Rūpe, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasikaronto, rūpāniccatañca yathābhūtaṃ samanupassanto rūpesupi nibbindati.
sn35.159:4.10: dhamme, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, dhammāniccatañca yathābhūtaṃ samanupassatha.
sn35.159:4.11: Dhamme, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasikaronto, dhammāniccatañca yathābhūtaṃ samanupassanto dhammesupi nibbindati.
